column1: at all~in any way or to any extent~[æt ɔːl

column1: enough~as much or as many as required~[ɪˈnʌf

column1: at least~not less than; at the minimum~[æt liːst

column1: cinema~a theater where films are shown for public entertainment~[ˈsɪnəmə

column4: "She borrowed a book from the library."

column1: playground~an outdoor area provided for children to play in
